overview: 5 years after the events of the first film retired government hacker Frank and his son live a quiet and peaceful life, that is until an old enemy re-surfaces to exact his revenge after suffering a humiliating defeat 5 years ago. Now Frank must fight to save his son once again and put an end to things once and for all.
tagline: Before You Embark On A Journey Of Revenge, Dig Two Graves
title: Kidnapper Part II
